home.description1: At Custom Steel, we combine craftsmanship with modern technology, creating solid structures tailored to individual needs. From design to installation –
home.description2: we take care of every stage of the process.

1.title: Precision and quality craftsmanship
1.description: We use modern technologies and proven methods to deliver durable, solid, and aesthetically pleasing products.

2.title: Individual approach to projects
2.description: We don’t offer off-the-shelf solutions. We adapt to your needs, space, and budget, delivering tailor-made projects.

3.title: Trusted partner in realization
3.description: From the first contact to the final installation – you can count on our support, timeliness, and full commitment.

about.title: What do we do?
about.description: Custom Steel is a dynamically growing company specializing in custom metal structures such as doors, walls, railings, furniture, barriers, and electrical services. We combine the precision of craftsmanship with modern technologies to deliver top-quality products tailored to our clients’ needs. Our passion for creating durable and aesthetic solutions, along with a professional approach to every project, guarantees satisfaction and reliability.

contact.title: Get in touch with us
contact.title2: Have an idea for a project?
contact.description: Send us a reference photo, dimensions, material, and other relevant information, and we will prepare a quote. We’ll respond within 24 hours.
